format: A data frame with 9 observations on the following 7 variables.

parameters.nA: number of subjects using toothpaste A.
parameters.meanB: mean DMFS index of subjects using toothpaste B.
parameters.sdA:
standard deviation of DMFS index of subjects 
using toothpaste A.
parameters.meanA: mean DMFS index of subjects using toothpaste A.
parameters.sdB:
standard deviation of DMFS index of subjects 
using toothpaste B.
parameters.nB: number of subjects using toothpaste B.

reference:
The data are the results of nine randomised trials comparing
two different toothpastes for the prevention of caries development.
The outcomes in each trial was the change, from baseline, in
the decayed, missing (due to caries) and filled surface dental
index (DMFS).
description:
Description
Meta-analysis of studies comparing two different toothpastes.
title: Toothpaste Data
